GE07bhg4c15u:3: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:5: vairāgyeṇa vinā jñānaṃ na ca bhaktir ataḥ sphuṭam |
GE07bhg4c15u:7: pūrvādhyānte māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena sevate [Gītā 14.26] ity ādinā parameśvaram ekānta-bhaktyā bhajatas tat-prasāda-labdha-jñānena
GE07bhg4c15u:9: na caikānta-bhaktiḥ jñānaṃ cāviraktasya sambhavatīti vairāgya-pūrvakaṃ jñānam upadeṣṭu-kāmaḥ prathamaṃ tāvat sārdha-ślokābhyāṃ saṃsāra-svarūpaṃ vṛkṣa-rūpakālaṅkāreṇa varṇayan bhagavān uvāca ūrdhva-mūlam iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:10: ūrdhvam uttamaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyām utkṛṣṭaḥ puruṣottamo mūlaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:11: adha iti tato 'rvācīnāṃ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagarbhādayo gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:12: te tu śākhā iva śākhā yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:13: vinaśvaratvena śvaḥ prabhāta-paryantam api na sthāsyatīti viśvāsānarhatvād aśvatthaṃ prāhuḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:20: yas tam evambhūtam aśvatthaṃ veda sa eva vedārtha-vit |
GE07bhg4c15u:26: vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sevyatām āpāditaś ca ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:27: ata evaṃ vidvān vedavid iti stūyate ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:28: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvādhyāye bhagavtā saṃsāra-bandha-hetūn guṇān vyākhyāya teṣām atyayena brahma-bhāvo mokṣo mad-bhajanena labhyata ity uktam --
GE07bhg4c15u:30: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:31: tatra manuṣyasya tava bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva ity āśaṅkāyāṃ svasya brahma-rūpatā-jñāpanāya sūtra-bhūto 'yaṃ śloko bhagavatoktaḥ -
GE07bhg4c15u:33: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca ||[Gītā 14.27] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:36: śrī-kṛṣṇasya hi tattvaṃ jñātvā tat-prema-bhajanena guṇātītaḥ san brahma-bhāvaṃ katham āpnuyāl loka iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:37: tatra brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity ādi bhagavad-vacanam ākarṇya mama tulyo manuṣyo 'yaṃ katham evaṃ vadatīti
GE07bhg4c15u:38: vismayāviṣṭam apratibhayā lajjayā ca kiṃcid api praṣṭum aśaknuvan tam arjunam ālakṣya kṛpayā sva-svarūpaṃ vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca ūrdhveti |
GE07bhg4c15u:39: tatra viraktasyaiva saṃsārād bhagavat-tattva-jñāne 'dhikāro nānyatheti pūrvādhyāyoktaṃ parameśvarādhīna-prakṛti-puruṣa-saṃyoga-kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:45: sarva-saṃsāra-bhramādhiṣṭhānaṃ brahma tad eva māyayā mūlam asyety
GE07bhg4c15u:47: adha ity arvācīnāḥ kāryopādhayo hiraṇyagrabhādyā gṛhyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:48: te nānā-dik-prasṛtatvāc chākhā iva śākhā asyety adhaḥ-śākham |
GE07bhg4c15u:49: āśu-vināśitvena na śvo 'pi sthāteti viśvāsānarham aśvattham māyā-mayaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:51: antareṇānucchedyam anantam avyayam āhuḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:52: śrutayas tāvat -- ūrdhva-mūlo 'vāk-śākha eṣo 'śvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ [KaṭhU 2.3.1] ity ādyaḥ kaṭha-vallīṣu paṭhitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:54: mahad-ahaṅkāra-tanmātrādayo vā śākhā asyety arvāk-śākha ity
GE07bhg4c15u:64: etac chittvā ca bhittvā ca jñānena paramāsinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:65: tataś cātma-gatiṃ prāpya tasmān nāvartate punaḥ || [Mbh 14.35.20-22] ity ādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:66: avyaktam avyākṛtaṃ māyopādhikaṃ brahma tad eva mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasmāt prabhavo yasya sa tathā
GE07bhg4c15u:69: saṃsārasya ca buddheḥ sakāśān nānā-vidhāḥ pariṇāmā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:70: tena sādharmyeṇa buddhir eva skandhas tan-mayas tat-pracuro 'yam |
GE07bhg4c15u:71: indriyāṇām antarāṇi cchidrāṇy eva koṭarāṇi yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c15u:73: pṛthivy-antāni vividhāḥ śākhā yasya viśākhaḥ stambho yasyeti vā |
GE07bhg4c15u:77: etad brahma-vanam asya brahmaṇo jīva-rūpasya bhogyaṃ vananīyaṃ sambhajanīyam iti vanaṃ brahma
GE07bhg4c15u:78: sākṣivad ācarati na tv etat kṛtena lipyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:80: saṃsāra-vṛkṣātmakaṃ chittvā ca bhittvā cāhaṃ, brahmāsmīty
GE07bhg4c15u:81: atidṛḍha-jñāna-khaḍgena sa-mūlaṃ nikṛtyety arthaḥ ātma-rūpāṃ gatiṃ prāpya tasmād ātma-rūpān mokṣān nāvartata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:84: ardhonmūlitaṃ mārutena mahāntam aśvattham upamānīkṛtya jīvantam iyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:91: yathā vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni parṇāni bhavanti tathā saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya parirakṣaṇāthāni
GE07bhg4c15u:93: yas taṃ yathā-vyākhyātaṃ sa-mūlaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣaṃ māyā-mayam aśvatthaṃ veda jānāti sa veda-vit karma-brahmākhya-vedārtha-vit sa evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:94: saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya hi mūlaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhādayaś ca jīvāḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:96: sa ca saṃsāra-vṛkṣaḥ svarūpeṇa vinaśvaraḥ pravāha-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:98: sa ca vedoktaiḥ karmabhiḥ sicyate brahma-jñānena ca cchidyata ity etāvān eva hi vedārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:99: yaś ca vedārthavit sa eva sarva-vid iti
GE07bhg4c15u:103: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti pañcadaśe kathā ||
GE07bhg4c15u:106: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:107: tatra tava manuṣyasya bhakti-yogena kathaṃ brahma-bhāva iti cet, satyam ahaṃ manuṣya eva kintu brahmaṇo 'pi tasya pratiṣṭhā paramāśraya ity asya sūtra-rūpasya vṛtti-sthānīyo 'yaṃ pañcadaśādhyāya ārabhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:108: tatra sa guṇān samatītya ity uktam iti guṇamyo 'yaṃ saṃsāraḥ kaḥ, kuto vāyaṃ pravṛttas tad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan jīvo vā kaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:110: kalpate ity uktaṃ brahma vā kiṃ |
GE07bhg4c15u:111: brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhā tvaṃ vā ka ity-ādy-apekṣāyāṃ prathamam atiśayokty-alaṅkāreṇa saṃsāro 'yam adbhuto
GE07bhg4c15u:114: prakṛti-bījottha-prathama-praroha-rūpa-mahat-tattvātmakaś caturmukha eka eva mūlaṃ yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c15u:117: tāḥ śākhā yasya tam aśvatthaṃ dharmādi-caturvarga-sādhakatvād aśvattham uttamaṃ vṛkṣam |
GE07bhg4c15u:118: śleṣeṇa bhaktimatāṃ na śvaḥ sthāsyatīty aśvatthaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:121: chandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūmikām aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ ity ādyāḥ karma-pratipādakā vedāḥ saṃsāra-vardhakatvāt parṇāni
GE07bhg4c15u:124: tathā ca ūrdhva-mūlo 'vāk-śākha eṣo 'śvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ [KaṭhU 2.3.1] iti
GE07bhg4c15u:128: ahaṃ sarvottamaḥ śrīmān iti pañcadaśe smṛtam ||
GE07bhg4c15u:131: sa ca bahuvidhas tad-atyayaś ca bhagavad-bhakti-śiraskena viveka-jñānena
GE07bhg4c15u:132: bhavet tasmiṃś ca sati samprāpta-nija-svarūpo jīvo bhagavantam āśritya
GE07bhg4c15u:135: tad-viveka-jñāna-sthairya-karaṃ vairāgyaṃ jīvasya bhajanīya-bhagavad-aṃśatvaṃ bhagavataḥ svetara-sarvottamatvaṃ cokteṣv artheṣūpayogāya pañcadaśe 'smin varṇyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:137: saṃsārasya vairāgya-vaiccedyatvāt saṃsāraṃ vṛkṣatvena vairāgyaṃ ca śastratvena rūpayan varṇayati bhagavān -- ūrdhvamūlam ity ādibhis tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:148: tādṛśena viveka-jñānena vinā nivṛtter abhāvād avyayaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:154: vṛkṣaṃ yo veda samprati || [KaṭhU 2.3.1] ity ādikāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:156: vāsanāā-rūpa-tan-nidāna-vardhakatvāt parṇāni prāhus tāni cchandāṃsi vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūti-kāma aindram ekādaśaka-pālaṃ nirvapet
GE07bhg4c15u:158: patrais tarur vardhate śobhate ca tam aśvatthaṃ yo veda yathoktaṃ jānāti sa eva veda-vit |
GE07bhg4c15u:159: vedaḥ khalu saṃsārasya vṛkṣatvaṃ chedyatvābhiprāyeṇāha tad-chedanopāyajño vedārthavid iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:161: adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā guṇa-pravṛddhā viṣaya-pravālāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:162: adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni karmānubandhīni manuṣya-loke ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:166: teṣu ca ye duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu
GE07bhg4c15u:169: jala-secanair iva yathāyathaṃ pravṛddhā vṛddhiṃ prāptāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:170: kiṃ ca, viṣayā rūpādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:173: kiṃ ca, adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:181: manuṣya-lokaṃ prāptānāṃ tat-tad-anurūpeṣu karmasu pravṛttir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:182: tasminn eva hi karmādhikāro nānyeṣu lokeṣu |
GE07bhg4c15u:184: madhusūdanaḥ : tasyaiva saṃsāra-vṛkṣasyāvayava-sambandhiny aparā kalpanocyate adhaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:188: teṣu ye kapūya-caraṇā duṣkṛtinas te 'dhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā vistāraṃ gatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:189: ye tu ramaṇīya-caraṇāḥ sukṛtinas ta ūrdhvaṃ devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtā ato 'dhaś ca manuṣyatvād ārabhya viriñci-paryantam ūrdhvaṃ ca tasmād evārabhya
GE07bhg4c15u:191: kīdṛśas tāḥ ? guṇaiḥ sattva-rajas-tamo bhir dehendriya-viṣayākāra-pariṇatair
GE07bhg4c15u:193: kiṃ ca, viṣayāḥ śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallavā iva yāsāṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-śākhānāṃ tās tathā śākhāgra-sthānīyābhir indriya-vṛttibhiḥ sambandhād rāgādhiṣṭhānatvāc ca
GE07bhg4c15u:195: kiṃ ca, adhaś ca ca-śabdād ūrdhvaṃ ca mūlāny avāntarāṇi
GE07bhg4c15u:199: mukhyaṃ ca mūlaṃ brahmaiveti na doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:201: avāntara-mūlāni ? karma dharmādharma-lakṣaṇam anubandhuṃ paścāj janayituṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:203: kutra ? manuṣya-loke manuṣyaś cāsau lokaaś cety adhikṛto brāhmaṇyādi-viśiṣṭo deho manuṣya-lokas tasmin bāhulyena karmānubandhīni |
GE07bhg4c15u:205: viśvanāthaḥ : adhaḥ paśv-ādi-yoniṣu ūrdhve devādi-yoniṣu prasṛtās tasya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya guṇaiḥ sattvādi-vṛttibhir jala-sekair iva pravṛddhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:206: viṣayā śabdādayaḥ pravālāḥ pallava-sthānīyā yāsāṃ tāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:208: sarva-lokair alakṣito mahā-nidhiḥ kaścid astīty anumīyate yam eva mūla-jaṭābhir avalambya sthitasya tasyāśvattha-vṛkṣasyāpi baṭa-vṛkṣasyeva
GE07bhg4c15u:209: śākhāsv api bāhyā jaṭāḥ santīty āha adhaś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:211: tasyādhaś ca manuṣya-loke karmānubandhīni karmānulambīni mūlāny
GE07bhg4c15u:213: karma-phalānāṃ yatas tato bhogānte punar manuṣya-janmany eva karmasu pravṛttāni bhavantīty arthaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:215: tasyokta-lakṣaṇasya saṃsārāśvatthasya śākhā adha ūrdhvaṃ ca prasṛtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:216: adho manuṣya-paśv-ādi-yoniṣu duṣkṛtair ūrdhvaṃ ca deva-gandharvādi-yoniṣu sukṛtair vistṛtāḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:223: tasyāśvatthasyādhaś ca śabdād ūrdhvaṃ cāvāntarāṇi mūlāny anusantatāni vistṛtāni santi |
GE07bhg4c15u:226: mukhyaṃ mūlaṃ tādṛk caturmukhas tat-tad-vāsanās tv avāntara-mūlāni nyagrodhasyaiva jaṭopajaṭāvṛndānīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:228: karmānubandhīni yatas tataḥ karma-phala-bhogāvasāne sati punar manuṣya-loke karma-hetu-bhūtāni bhavantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:232: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā |
GE07bhg4c15u:237: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī ||4||
GE07bhg4c15u:238: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca, na rūpam iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:239: iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya tathordhva-mūlatvādi-prakāreṇa rūpaṃ nopalabhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:245: saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedo 'narthakaraś ca tasmād enaṃ dṛḍhena vairāgyena śastreṇa cchitvā tattva-jñāne yatetety āha aśvattham enam iti sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:252: tataś tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat padaṃ vastu parimārgitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ |
GE07bhg4c15u:253: kīdṛśaṃ, yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartanti nāvartanta ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:255: yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā |
GE07bhg4c15u:256: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:258: madhusūdanaḥ : yas tv ayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo varṇita iha saṃsāre sthitaiḥ prāṇibhir asya saṃsāra-vṛkṣasya tathordhva-mūlatvādi tathā tena prakāreṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:268: evaṃ-bhūto 'yaṃ saṃsāra-vṛkṣo durucchedaḥ sarvānartha-karaś ca tasmād anādy-ajñānena suvirūḍha-mūlam atyanta-baddha-mūlaṃ prāg-uktam aśvatthaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:275: tato gurum upasṛtya tato 'śvatthād ūrdhvaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicāreṇa parimārgitavyaṃ mārgayitavyam anveṣṭavyaṃ so
GE07bhg4c15u:277: tat padaṃ śravaṇādinā jñātavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:278: kiṃ tat padaṃ yasmin pade gatāḥ praviṣṭā jñānena na nivartanti nāvartante bhūyaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya
GE07bhg4c15u:280: ? ity āha - yaḥ pada-śabdenoktas tam eva cādyam ādau bhavaṃ puruṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:281: yenedaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇaṃ taṃ puruṣu pūrṣu vā śayānaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ gato 'smīty evaṃ tad-eka-śaraṇatayā tad anveṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:282: taṃ kaṃ puruṣaṃ ? yato yasmāt puruṣāt pravṛttir māyā-maya-saṃsāra-vṛkṣa-pravṛttiḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:283: purāṇī cirantany anādir eṣā prasṛtā niḥsṛtaindrajālikād iva māyā-hasty-ādi
GE07bhg4c15u:285: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ceha manuṣya-loke 'sya rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ tathā sa-niścayaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:286: nopalabhyate satyo 'yaṃ mithyāyaṃ nityo 'yam iti vādi-mata-vaividhyād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:287: na cānto 'paryantatvān na cādir anāditvān na ca sampratiṣṭhāśrayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:288: kiṃ vādhāraḥ ko 'yam ity api nopalabhyate
GE07bhg4c15u:291: jīva-mātra-duḥkhaika-nidānasyāsya chedakaṃ śastram asaṅgaṃ jñātvā tenaitaṃ chittvaivāsya mūla-tala-stho mahānidhir anveṣṭavya ity āha aśvattham iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:292: asaṅgo 'nāsaktiḥ sarvatra vairāgyam iti yāvat tena śastreṇa kuṭhāreṇa cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya tatas tasya mūla-bhūtaṃ tat-padaṃ vastu
GE07bhg4c15u:294: kīdṛśaṃ tad ata āha yasmin gatā yat padaṃ prāptāḥ santo bhūyo na nivartante na cāvartanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:295: anveṣaṇa-prakāram āha yata eṣā purāṇī cirantanī saṃsāra-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā tam evādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye bhajāmīti bhaktyā anveṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c15u:296: baladevaḥ : na rūpam iti asyāśvatthasya rūpam iha manuṣya-loke tathā nopalabhyate yathordhva-mūlatvādi-dharmakatayā mayopavarṇitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:298: katham ayaṃ anartha-vrāta-jaṭilo vinaśyed iti na jñāyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:303: kintu manusyoo 'haṃ putro yajña-dattasya,, pitā ca deva-dattasya,
GE07bhg4c15u:304: tad-anurūpa-karma-kārī sukhī duḥkhī, sāsmin deśe 'smin grāme nivasāmīty etāvad eva vijñāyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:305: yasmād evaṃ durbodho 'nartha-vrate hetuś cāyam aśvatthas tasmāt sat-prasaṅga-labdha-vastu-yāthātmya-jñānenainam
GE07bhg4c15u:306: asaṅga-śastreṇa vairāgya-kuṭhāreṇa dṛḍhena vivekābhyāsa-niśitena cchitvā svataḥ pṛthak-kṛtya tat padaṃ parimārgitavyam iti pareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:307: saṅgo viṣayābhilāṣas tad-virodhy asaṅgo vairāgyaṃ, tad eva śastraṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:309: | tataḥ saṃsārāśvattha-mūlād uparisthitaṃ tat padaṃ parimārgitavyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:311: tat padaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tatrāha yasminn iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:312: yasmin gatās taiḥ sādhanair yat prāptā janās tato na nivartante svargād iva na patanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:315: yataḥ purāṇī cirantanīyaṃ jagat-pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā vistṛtā |
GE07bhg4c15u:316: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ vrajāmīti prapatti-pūrvakaiḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:319: saṃsāra-nivṛttiḥ sa khalu kṛṣṇa eva ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavaḥ ity ādeḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:320: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī ity ādeś ca tad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:321: na tad bhāsayata ity ādinā vyaktībhāvitvāc ca ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c15u:327: śrīdharaḥ : tat-prāptau sādhanāntarāṇi darśayann āha nirmāneti |
GE07bhg4c15u:339: madhusūdanaḥ : parimārgaṇa-pūrvakaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gacchatām aṅgāntarāṇy āha nirmāṇeti |
GE07bhg4c15u:349: vinivṛtta-kāmā viśeṣeto niravaśeṣeṇa nivṛttāḥ kāmā viṣaya-bhogā yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c15u:354: sukha-duḥkha-saṅgair iti pāṭhāntare sukha-duḥkhābhyāṃ saṅgaḥ sambandho yeṣāṃ taiḥ sukha-duḥkha-saṅgair dvandvair vimuktāḥ parityaktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:357: viśvanāthaḥ : tad-bhaktau satyāṃ janāḥ kīdṛśā bhūtvā taṃ padaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:361: baladevaḥ : tat-prapattau satyāṃ kīdṛśāḥ santas tat padaṃ prāpnuvantīty
GE07bhg4c15u:366: adhyātmaṃ sva-parātma-viṣayako vimarśaḥ sa nityo nitya-kartavyo yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c15u:370: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:371: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:372: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:378: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśinaṣṭi na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:379: yad vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ gatvā yogino na nivartante tat padaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:381: sūryāsta-maye 'pi candro bhāsako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na śaśāṅkaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:383: asta-maye 'gniḥ prakāśako dṛṣṭa ity āśaṅkyāha na pāvakaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:385: kutaḥ sūryādīnāṃ tatra prakāśanāsāmarthyam ity ata āha tad dhāma jyotiḥ svayaṃ-prakāśam
GE07bhg4c15u:386: ādiyādi-sakala-jaḍa-jyotir-avabhāsakaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama viṣṇoḥ svarūpātmakaṃ padam |
GE07bhg4c15u:387: na hi yo yad-bhāsyaḥ sa svabhāsakaṃ taṃ bhāsayitum īṣṭe |
GE07bhg4c15u:389: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:391: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || [KaṭhU 2.2.15] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:392: etena tat padaṃ vedyaṃ na vā, ādye vedya-bhinna-veditṛ-sāpekṣatvena
GE07bhg4c15u:394: avedyatve saty api svayam aparokṣatvāt tatrāvedyatvaṃ sūryādy-abhāsyatvenātroktaṃ,
GE07bhg4c15u:395: sarva-bhāsakatvena tu svayam aparokṣatvaṃ yad āditya-gataṃ teja ity atra
GE07bhg4c15u:397: evam ubhābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ śruter dalad-vacaṃ vyākhyātam iti draṣṭavyam ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:398: viśvanāthaḥ : tat padam eva kīdṛśam ity apekṣāyām āha na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:400: tan mama paramaṃ dhāma sarvotkṛṣṭam ajaḍam atīndriyaṃ tejaḥ sarva-prakāśakam |
GE07bhg4c15u:402: tat paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat |
GE07bhg4c15u:403: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata || [HV 2.114.12] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:404: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:406: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti || iti [KaṭhU 2.2.15] śrutibhyaś ca ||6||
GE07bhg4c15u:407: baladevaḥ : gantavyaṃ padaṃ viśiṣyan paricāyayati na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:408: prapannā yad gatvā yato na nivartante |
GE07bhg4c15u:409: tan mamaiva dhāma svarūpaṃ paramaṃ śrīmat |
GE07bhg4c15u:410: sarvāvabhāsakā api sūryādayas tan na bhāsayanti prakāśayanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:411: na tatra sūryo bhāti ity ādi-śruteś ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:418: śrīdharaḥ : nanu ca tvadīyaṃ dhāma prāptāḥ santo yadi na nivartante tarhi sati sampadya na viduḥ sati sampadyāmahe ity ādi śruteḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:419: suṣupti-pralaya-samaye tattva-prāptiḥ sarveṣām astīti ko nāma saṃsārī syād
GE07bhg4c15u:420: ity āśaṅkya saṃsāriṇaṃ darśayati mamaiveti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:422: avidyayā jīva-bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ sarvadā saṃsāritvena prasiddhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:424: suṣupti-pralayayoḥ prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:428: suṣupti-pralayayor api mad-aṃśatvāt sarvasāpi jīva-mātrasya mayi layād asty eva mat-prāptiḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:434: ataś ca punaḥ saṃsārāya nirgacchan avidvān prakṛtau līnatayā sthitāni svopādhi-bhūtānīndriyāṇi ākarṣati |
GE07bhg4c15u:436: madhusūdanaḥ : jīvasya tu pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmaivety asakṛd
GE07bhg4c15u:438: tad etat sarvaṃ pratipādyata uttareṇa granthena |
GE07bhg4c15u:439: tatra jīvasya brahma-rūpatvād ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-svarūpaṃ prāptasya tato na pracyutir iti pratipādyate mamaivāṃśa [Gītā 15.7a] iti ślokārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:440: suṣuptau tu sarva-kārya-saṃskāra-sahitājñāna-sattvāt tataḥ punaḥ saṃsāro jīvasyeti
GE07bhg4c15u:442: tatas tasya vastuto 'saṃsāriṇo 'pi māyayā saṃsāraṃ prāptasya manda-matibhir
GE07bhg4c15u:443: deha-tādātmyaṃ prāpitasya dehād vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate śarīram [Gītā
GE07bhg4c15u:446: yathāyathaṃ sva-viṣayeṣv indriyāṇāṃ pravartakasya tasya tebhyo vyatirekaḥ pratipādyate
GE07bhg4c15u:448: svātma-rūpatvāt kim iti sarve na paśyantīty āśaṅkāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:449: viṣaya-vikṣipta-cittā darśana-yogyam api taṃ na paśyantīty uttaram ucyate
GE07bhg4c15u:452: paśyantīti vivṛtaṃ yatanto yoginaḥ [Gītā 15.11a] iti ślokārdhena |
GE07bhg4c15u:453: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti [Gītā 15.10b] ity etad vivṛtaṃ yatanto 'pi [Gītā 15.11b] iti ślokārdheneti pañcānāṃ ślokānāṃ saṅgatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:455: mamaiva paramātmano 'ṃśo niraṃśasyāpi māyayā kalpitaḥ sūryasyeva jale nabhasa iva ca ghaṭe mṛṣābhedavān aṃśa ivāṃśo jīva-loke saṃsāre, sa ca prāṇa-dhāraṇopādhinā jīva-bhūtaḥ kartā bhoktā saṃsaratīti mṛṣaiva prasiddhim upāgataḥ sanātano nitya upādhi-paricchede 'pi vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:457: ato jñānādi-jñāna-nivṛttyā sva-svarūpaṃ brahma prāpya tato na nivartanta iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:458: evam-bhūto 'pi suṣuptāt katham āvartata ity āha - manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni
GE07bhg4c15u:464: ato jñānād anāvṛttāv apy ajñānād āvṛttir nānupapanneti bhāvaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c15u:465: viśvanāthaḥ : tvad-bhaktyā saṃsāram atikrāmyan ta-pada-gāmī jīvaḥ ka ity
GE07bhg4c15u:467: yad uktaṃ vārāhe svāṃśaś cātha vibhinnāṃśa iti dvedhāyam iṣyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:469: sanātano nityaḥ sa ca baddha-daśāyāṃ manaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīndriyāṇi prakṛtāv upādhau sthitāni karṣati |
GE07bhg4c15u:472: baladevaḥ : nanu tvat-prapattyā yas tat-padaṃ yāti, sa jīvaḥ ka ity apekṣāyām āha mamaiveti
GE07bhg4c15u:473: jīvaḥ sarveśvarasya mamaivāṃśo, na tu brahma-rudrāder īśvarasya, sa ca sanātano nityo, na tu ghaṭākāśādivat
GE07bhg4c15u:475: sa ca jīva-loke prapañce sthito manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi
GE07bhg4c15u:479: tatra manaḥ sāttvikāhaṅkārasya śrotrādikaṃ tu rājasāhaṅkārasya kāryam iti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:480: bhagavat-prapattyā prākṛta-karaṇa-hīno bhagaval-lokaṃ gatas tu bhāgavatair
GE07bhg4c15u:481: deha-karaṇair vibhūṣaṇair iva viśiṣṭo bhagavantaṃ saṃśrayan nivasatīti
GE07bhg4c15u:482: sūcyate -- sa vā eṣa brahma-niṣṭha idaṃ śarīraṃ martyam atisṛjya brahmābhisampadya brahmaṇā paśyati brahmaṇā śṛṇoti brahmaṇaivedaṃ sarvam anubhavati iti mādhyandināyana-śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:486: yat tu ghaṭākāśavaj jalākāśavad vā jīve brahmaṇo 'ṃśo
GE07bhg4c15u:489: śuddha-brahmatvam iti vadanti, na tat sāram, jīva-bhūtaḥ, mamāṃśaḥ,
GE07bhg4c15u:493: pratibimba-sādṛśyāt tu tattvaṃ mantavyam ambuvad adhikaraṇa-vinirṇayāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:494: tasmāt brahmopasarjanatvaṃ jīvasya brahmāṃśatvaṃ vidhu-maṇḍalasya śatāṃśaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:495: śukra-maṇḍalam ity ādau dṛṣṭaṃ cedam eka-vastv-eka-deśatvaṃ cāṃśatvam āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:496: brahma khalu śaktimad ekaṃ vastu brahma-śaktiḥ, itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parāṃ jīva-bhūtām [Gītā 7.5] iti pūrvokter atas tad eka-deśāt
GE07bhg4c15u:499: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:503: yad yadā śarīrāntaraṃ karma-vaśād avāpnoti yataś ca śarīrād utkrāmatīśvaro dehādīnāṃ svāmī tadā pūrvasmāt śarīrād etāni gṛhītvā tac-charīrāntaraṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:507: sva-sthānāt kusumādeḥ sakāśāt gandhān gandhavataḥ sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā vāyur yathā gacchati tadvat ||8||
GE07bhg4c15u:508: madhusūdanaḥ : asmin kāle karṣatīty ucyate śarīram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:509: yad yadotkrāmati bahir nirgacchatīśvaro dehendriya-saṃghātasya svāmī jīvas tadā yato dehād utkrāmati tato manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi karṣatīti dvitīya-pādasya prathamam anvaya utkramaṇottara-bhāvitvād gamanasya |
GE07bhg4c15u:510: na kevalaṃ karṣaty eva, kintu yad yadā ca pūrvasmāc charīrāntaram avāpnoti tadaitāni manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhāīndriyāṇi gṛhītvā saṃyāty api samyak punar āgamana-rāhityena
GE07bhg4c15u:512: śarīre saty evendriya-grahaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ - āśayāt kusumādeḥ sthānād gandhān gandhātmakān sūkṣmān aṃśān gṛhītvā yathā vāyur vāti tadvat
GE07bhg4c15u:513: viśvanāthaḥ : tāny akṛṣya kiṃ karotīty apekṣāyām āha śarīram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:515: sthūla-śarīraṃ karma-vaśād avāpnoti, yac ca yasmāc ca śarīrād utkrāmati
GE07bhg4c15u:516: niṣkrāmati, īśvaro dehendriyādi-svāmī jīvaḥ tasmāt tatra etānīndriyāṇi
GE07bhg4c15u:517: bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhītvaiva saṃyāti vāyur gandhāni iveti vāyur yathāśayād gandhāśrayāt srak-candanādeḥ sakāśāt sūkṣmāvayavaiḥ saha
GE07bhg4c15u:518: gandhān gṛhītvānyatra yāti tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:519: baladevaḥ : jīva-loke sthita indriyāṇi karṣati ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:521: īśvaraḥ śarīrendriyāṇaṃ svāmī jīvo yad yadā
GE07bhg4c15u:522: pūrva-śarīrād anyac charīram avāpnoti, yadā cāptāc charīrād utkrāmati,
GE07bhg4c15u:523: tadaitānīndriyāṇi bhūta-sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhṭivā yāty āśayāt puṣpa-kośād
GE07bhg4c15u:524: gandhān gṛhītvā vāyur iva sa yathānyatra yāti tadvat ||8||
GE07bhg4c15u:525: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:527: śrīdharaḥ : tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha
GE07bhg4c15u:529: śrotrādīni bāhyendriyāṇi manaś cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ, tāny adhiṣṭāyāśritya śabdādīn viṣayān ayaṃ jīva upabhuṅkte ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:530: madhusūdanaḥ : tāny evendriyāṇi darśayan yad arthaṃ gṛhītvā gacchati tad āha śrotram iti
GE07bhg4c15u:531: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:532: ca-kārāt karmendriyāṇi prāṇaṃ ca manaś ca ṣaṣṭham adhiṣṭhāyaivāśrityaiva viṣayān śabdādīn ayaṃ jīva upasevate bhuṅkte ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:533: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra gatvā kiṃ karotīty ata āha śrotram iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:534: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi manaś cādhiṣṭhāyāśritya viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte
GE07bhg4c15u:535: baladevaḥ : tāni gṛhītvā kim arthaṃ yāti |
GE07bhg4c15u:537: śrotrādīni samanaskāny adhiṣṭhāyāśrityāyaṃ jīvo viṣayān śabdādīn upabhuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c15u:539: ca-śabdāt karmendriyāṇi ca pañca prāṇāṃś cādhiṣṭhāye ty avagamyam ||9||
GE07bhg4c15u:541: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:543: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kārya-kāraṇa-saṅghāta-vyatirekeṇa evambhūtam ātmānaṃ sarve 'pi kiṃ na paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:545: utkrāmantaṃ dehād dehāntaraṃ gacchantaṃ tasminn eva dehe sthitaṃ vā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam indriyādi-yuktaṃ jīvaṃ vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti nālokayanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:546: jñānam eva cakṣur yeṣāṃ te vivekinaḥ paśyanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c15u:547: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ deha-gataṃ darśana-yogayam api dehāt utkrāmantam iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:548: utkrāmantaṃ dehāntaraṃ gacchantaṃ pūrvasmāt, sthitaṃ vāpi tasminn eva
GE07bhg4c15u:552: evaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu darśana-yogyam apy enaṃ vimūḍhā
GE07bhg4c15u:555: aho kaṣṭaṃ vartata ity ajñān anukrośati bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c15u:556: ye tu pramāṇa-janita-jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivekinas ta eva paśyanti ||10||
GE07bhg4c15u:557: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu yamād dehān niṣkrāmati yasmin dehe vā tiṣṭhati tatra
GE07bhg4c15u:558: sthitvā vā yathā bhogān bhuṅkte ity evaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalabhāmahe |
GE07bhg4c15u:559: tatrāha utkrāmantaṃ dehānn niṣkrāmantaṃ, sthitaṃ dehāntare vartamānaṃ ca viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ ca guṇānvitam indiryādi-sahitaṃ vimūḍhā avivekinaḥ jñāna-cakṣuṣo
GE07bhg4c15u:561: baladevaḥ : evaṃ śarīrasthatvenānubhavayogyam avivekinas tam ātmānaṃ nānubhavantīty āha ud iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:562: śarīrād utkrāmantaṃ tatraiva sthitaṃ vā sthitvā viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitaṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohair indiryādibhir vānvitaṃ yuktam anubhava-yogyam apy ātmānaṃ vimūḍhāś
GE07bhg4c15u:566: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam |
GE07bhg4c15u:568: śrīdharaḥ : durjñeyaś cāyaṃ yato vivekiṣv api kecit paśyanti kecin na
GE07bhg4c15u:570: yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yoginaḥ kecid enam ātmānam ātmani dehe 'vasthitaṃ viviktaṃ paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:571: śāstrābhyāsādibhiḥ prayatnaṃ kurvāṇā apy akṛtātmāno 'viśuddha-cittā ata evācetaso manda-mataya enaṃ na paśyanti ||11||
GE07bhg4c15u:572: madhusūdanaḥ : paśyanti jñāna-cakṣuṣa ity etad vivṛṇoti yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:573: ātmani sva-buddhāv avasthitaṃ pratiphalitam enam ātmānam yatanto dhyānādibhiḥ prayatamānā yogina eva paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:575: yatamānā apy akṛtātmāno yajñādibhir aśodhitāntaḥ-karaṇā ata evācetaso viveka-śūnyā
GE07bhg4c15u:576: nainaṃ paśyantīti vimūḍhā nānupaśyantīty etad vivaraṇam ||11||
GE07bhg4c15u:577: viśvanāthaḥ : te ca vivekino yatamānā yogina evety āha yatanta iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:579: baladevaḥ : jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ paśyanti ity etad vivṛṇvan durjñānatāṃ tasyāh
GE07bhg4c15u:581: kecid yogino yatamānāḥ śravaṇādy-upāyān anutiṣṭhanta ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam enam ātmānaṃ paśyanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:587: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:588: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ na tad bhāsayate sūrya ity ādinā pārameśvaraṃ paraṃ dhāmoktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:592: idānīṃ tad eva pārameśvaraṃ rūpam ananta-śaktitvena nirūpayati yad ity ādi-caturbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:593: | ādiyādiṣu sthitaṃ yad aneka-prakāraṃ tejo viśvaṃ prakāśayati tat sarvaṃ tejo madīyam eva jānīhi ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:594: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ yat padaṃ sarvāvabhāsana-kṣamā apy ādityādayo bhāsayituṃ na kṣamante yat-prāptāś ca mumukṣavaḥ punaḥ saṃsārāya nāvartante yasya ca padasyopādi-bhedam anu vidhīyamānā jīvā ghaṭākāśādaya ivākāśasya kalpitāṃśā mṛṣaiva saṃsāram anubhavanti tasya padasya sarvātmatva-sarva-vyavahārāspadatva-pradarśanena brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham
GE07bhg4c15u:595: [Gītā 14.27] iti prāg uktaṃ vivarītuṃ caturbhiḥ ślokair ātmano
GE07bhg4c15u:597: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candra-tārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ [KaṭhU 2.2.15] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c15u:598: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti
GE07bhg4c15u:600: yad āditya-gataṃ tejaś caitnyātmakaṃ jyotir yac candramasi yac cāgnau sthitaṃ tejo jagad akhilam avabhāsayate tat tejo māmakaṃ madīyaṃ viddhi |
GE07bhg4c15u:602: samānaṃ caitanyātmakaṃ jyotis tathāpi sattvotkarṣeṇādityādīnām utkarṣāt tatraivāvistarāṃ caitanya-jyotir iti tair viśeṣyate yad āditya-gatam ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c15u:603: yathā tulye 'pi mukha-saṃnidhāne kāṣṭha-kuḍyādau na mukham āvirbhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:604: ādarśādau ca svacche svacchatare ca tāratamyenāvirbhavati tadvad yad āditya-gataṃ teja ity uktvā punas tat tejo viddhi māmakam iti
GE07bhg4c15u:605: tejo-grahaṇād yad ādityādi-gataṃ tejaḥ prakāśaḥ para-prakāśa-samarthaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:606: sita-bhāsvaraṃ rūpaṃ jagad akhilaṃ rūpavad vastu avabhāsayate |
GE07bhg4c15u:607: evaṃ yac candramasi yac cāgnau jagad-avabhāsakaṃ tejas tan māmākaṃ viddhīti
GE07bhg4c15u:609: anyathā tan māmakaṃ viddhīty etāvad brūyāt tejo-grahaṇam antareṇaiveti bhāvaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:610: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evaṃ jīvasya baddhāvasthāyāṃ yat yat prāpya-vastu
GE07bhg4c15u:611: tatrāham eva sūrya-candrādy-ātmakaḥ sann upakaromīty āha yad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:612: āditya-sthitaṃ teja eva udaya-parvate prātar uditya jīvasya
GE07bhg4c15u:613: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-bhoga-sādhana-karma-pravartanārthaṃ jagad bhāsayata evaṃ ca yac candramasi aganau ca tat tad akhilaṃ māmakam eva |
GE07bhg4c15u:615: tat tejasa eva tat-tad-vibhūtir iti bhāvaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c15u:616: baladevaḥ : atha mad-aṃśasya jīvasya saṃsāra-raktasya mumukṣoś ca bhoga-mokṣa-sādhanam aham eveti bhāvenāha yad iti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:617: āditye sthitaṃ yat tejo yac candre 'gnau ca sthitaṃ sat sarvaṃ jagat prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c15u:623: uditena candreṇa cauṣadhi-poṣa-tāpa-śānti-jyotsnāvihārās tathābhūtā bhavantīti teṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:625: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā |
GE07bhg4c15u:626: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:628: gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā balenādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:629: aham eva rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:630: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ ca, gāṃ pṛthivīm pṛthivī-devatā-rūpeṇāviśyaujasā nijena balena pṛthivīṃ dhūli-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bhūtāni pṛthivyādheyāni
GE07bhg4c15u:632: anyathā pṛthivī sikatā-muṣṭivad viśīryatādho nimajjed vā |
GE07bhg4c15u:633: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [YajuḥK 1.8.5, TaittS
GE07bhg4c15u:635: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti ca hiraṇyagarbha-bhāvāpannaṃ bhagavantam evāha |
GE07bhg4c15u:637: sarva-rasa-svabhāvaḥ somo bhūtvauṣadhīḥ sarvā brīhi-yavādyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātā aham eva puṣṇāmi puṣṭimatī rasa-svādumatīś ca karomi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:638: viśvanāthaḥ : gāṃ pṛthvīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśyādhiṣṭhāyāham eva carācarāṇi bhūtāni dhārayāmi
GE07bhg4c15u:639: tathāham evāmṛta-rasamayaḥ somo bhūtvā brīhy-ādy-auṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ saṃvardhayāmi ||13||
GE07bhg4c15u:640: baladevaḥ : gām iti pāṃśu-muṣṭi-tulyāṃ gāṃ pṛthivīm ojasā sva-śaktyāviśya
GE07bhg4c15u:643: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:646: tathāham eva rasātmakaḥ somo 'mṛtamayaś candro bhūtvā sarvā auṣadhīr nikhilā brīhy-ādyāḥ puṣṇāmi
GE07bhg4c15u:648: tathā ca bhūmiloke sthitasya jīvasya vividha-prāsāda-bāṭikā-taḍāgādi-krīḍā-sthānāni nirmāya
GE07bhg4c15u:651: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:654: aham īśvara eva vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnir bhūtvā prāṇināṃ dehasyāntaḥ praviśya prānāpānābhyāṃ ca tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:655: sahitaḥ prāṇibhir bhuktaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyaṃ ceti caturvidham annaṃ pacāmi |
GE07bhg4c15u:656: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:657: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate pāyasādi tad bhojyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:658: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena kramaśo nigīryate dravībhūtaṃ guḍādi tal lehyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:659: yat tu daṃṣṭrādibhir niṣpīḍya sārāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyata
GE07bhg4c15u:660: ikṣu-daṇḍādi tac coṣyam iti caturvidho 'sya bhedaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c15u:663: bhūtvā ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedam annaṃ pacyate yad idam adyate [BAU 5.9.1] ity ādi śruti-pratipāditaḥ san prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham āśrito 'ntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:664: saṃyuktaḥ saṃdhukṣitaḥ san pacāmi prāṇibhir bhuktam annaṃ caturvidham bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyaṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:665: tatra yad dantair avakhaṇḍyāvakhaṇḍya bhakṣyate pūpādi tad bhakṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:666: yat tu kevalaṃ jihvayā viloḍya nigīryate sūpaudanādi tad bhojyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:667: yaj jihvāyāṃ nikṣipya rasāsvādena nigīryate kiṃcid dravībhūtaṃ guḍa-rasālā-śikhariṇy-ādi tal lehyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:668: yat tu dantair niṣpīḍya rasāṃśaṃ nigīryāvaśiṣṭaṃ tyajyate
GE07bhg4c15u:670: bhoktā yaḥ so 'gnri vaiśvānaro yad bhojyam annaṃ sa somas tad etad ubhayam agnīṣomau sarvam iti dhyāyato
GE07bhg4c15u:672: viśvanāthaḥ : vaiśvānaro jaṭharānalaḥ prāṇāpānābhyāṃ tad uddīpakābhyāṃ sahitaś caturvidhaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ coṣyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:678: baladevaḥ : bhogyānām annādīnāṃ pāka-hetuś cāham evety āha aham iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:679: vaiśvānaro jaṭharāgnis tac-charīrako bhūtvā prāṇināṃ sarveṣāṃ deham udaram āśritaḥ prānāpānābhyāṃ tad-uddīpakābhyāṃ samāyuktaś ca sann ahaṃ tair bhuktaṃ caturvidham annaṃ pacāmi pākaṃ nayāmi śrutiś caivam āha ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedaṃ annaṃ pacyate ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c15u:680: tathā cāham eva jāṭharāgni-śarīras tad-upakārīty evam āha sūtrakāraḥ --
GE07bhg4c15u:682: annasya cāturvidhyaṃ ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ cūṣyaṃ ceti bhedāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:690: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:691: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo
GE07bhg4c15u:693: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca sarvasya prāni-jātasya hṛdi samyag-antaryāmi-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:695: ataś ca matta eva hetoḥ prāṇi-mātrasya
GE07bhg4c15u:699: vedaiś ca sarvais tat-tad-devatādi-rūpeṇāham eva vedyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:704: eva ca vedārtha-vid apy aham eva ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:705: madhusūdanaḥ : kiṃ ca, sarvasya brahmādi-sthāvarāntasya prāṇi-jātasyāham
GE07bhg4c15u:706: ātmā san hṛdi buddhau saṃniviṣtaḥ sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ [BAU 1.4.7] iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:709: ato matta ātmana eva hetoḥ prāṇi-jātasya yathānurūpaṃ smṛtir etaj
GE07bhg4c15u:718: evaṃ svasya jīva-rūpatām uktvā brahma-rūpatām āha - vedaiś ca sarvair
GE07bhg4c15u:719: indrādi-devatā-prakāśakair api aham eva vedyaḥ sarvātmatvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:720: indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhur atho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān |
GE07bhg4c15u:721: ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanti agniṃ yamaṃ mātariśvānam āhuḥ || [Ṛk 2.3.22.6] iti mantra-varṇāt
GE07bhg4c15u:722: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ iti ca śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:725: na kevalam etāvad eva veda-vid eva cāhaṃ karma-kāṇḍopāsanā-kāṇḍa-jñāna-kāṇḍātmaka-mantra-brāhmaṇa-rūpa-sarva-vedārtha-vic
GE07bhg4c15u:727: ataḥ sādhūktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham [Gītā 14.27] ity ādi ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:728: viśvanāthaḥ : yathaiva jaṭhare jaṭharāgnir ahaṃ tathaiva sarvasya
GE07bhg4c15u:730: yato matto buddhi-tattvād eva pūrvānubhūtārtha-viṣayānusmṛtir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:732: viṣayendriya-yogajaṃ jñānaṃ ca apohanaṃ smṛti-jñānayor apagamaś ca bhavatīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:733: jīvasya bandhāvasthāyāṃ svasyopakārakatvam uktvā mokṣāvasthāyāṃ yat prāpyaṃ tatrāpy upakāratvam āha vedair iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:734: veda-vyāsa-dvārā vedānta-kṛd aham eva yato vedavid vedārtha-tattva-jño
GE07bhg4c15u:735: 'ham eva matto 'nyo vedārthaṃ na jānātīty arthaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c15u:736: baladevaḥ : prāṇināṃ jñānājñāna-hetuś cāham evety āha sarvasya ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:737: tayoḥ soma-vaiśvānarayoḥ sarvasya ca prāṇi-vṛndasya hṛdi
GE07bhg4c15u:741: ato matta eva sarvasya smṛtiḥ pūṛvānubhūta-vastu-viṣayānusandhi-jñānaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c15u:743: tayor apohanaṃ pramoṣaś ca matto bhavati |
GE07bhg4c15u:744: evam uktaṃ uddhavena tvatto jñānaṃ hi jīvānāṃ pramoṣas tatra śaktitaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:745: evaṃ sāṃsārika-bhoga-sādhanatāṃ svasyoktvā mokṣa-sādhanatām āha vedaiś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:746: sarvair nikhilair vedair aham eva sarveśvaraḥ sarva-śaktimān kṛṣṇo vedyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:747: yo 'sau sarvair vedair gīyate iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:749: paramparayā jñāna-kāṇḍena tu sākṣād iti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c15u:750: katham evaṃ pratyetavyam iti cet tatrāha vedānta-kṛd aham eveti |
GE07bhg4c15u:753: evam āha sūtra-kāraḥ -- ta tu samanvayāt [Vs 1.1.4] ity ādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:755: tatrāha vedavid eva cāham ity aham eva vedavid iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:756: bādarāyaṇaḥ san yam artham ahaṃ niraṇaiṣaṃ sa eva vedārthas tato 'nyathā
GE07bhg4c15u:760: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:762: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ mameti yad uktaṃ svakīyaṃ sarvottama-svarūpaṃ tad darśayati dvāv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:763: kṣaraś cākṣaraś ceti dvāv imau puruṣau loke prasiddhau |
GE07bhg4c15u:764: tāv evāha tatra kṣaraḥ puruṣo nāma sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni śarīrāṇi |
GE07bhg4c15u:767: parvata iva deheṣu naśyatsv api nirvikāratayā tiṣṭhatīti kūṭashtaś cetano bhoktā |
GE07bhg4c15u:768: sa tv akṣaraḥ puruṣa ity ucyate vivekibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:770: kṣarākṣara-śabda-vācya-kārya-kāraṇopādhi-dvaya-viyogena nirupādhikaṃ śuddham ātmānaṃ pratipādayati kṛpayā bhagavān arjunāya dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:771: dvāv imau pṛthag-rāśī-kṛtau puruṣau puruṣopādhitvena puruṣa-śabda-vyapadeśyau loke saṃsāre
GE07bhg4c15u:772: kau tau ? ity āha kṣarākṣara eva ca kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī kārya-rāśir ekaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:776: tau puruṣau vyācaṣṭe svayam eva bhagavān kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni samastaṃ kārya-jātam ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:778: tenāvaraṇa-vikṣepa-śakti-dvaya-rūpeṇa sthitaḥ kūṭastho bhagavān māyā-śakti-rūpaḥ kāraṇopādhiḥ saṃsāra-bījatvenānantyād akṣara ucyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:779: kecit tu kṣara-śabdenācetana-vargam uktvā kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyata ity anena
GE07bhg4c15u:783: tasmāt kṣarākṣara-śabdābhyāṃ kārya-kāraṇopādhī ubhāv api jaḍāv evocyete ity eva yuktam
GE07bhg4c15u:784: viśvanāthaḥ : yasmād aham eva vedavit tasmāt sarva-vedārtha-niṣkarṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:785: saṅkṣepeṇa bravīmi śṛṇu ity āha dvāv imāv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:787: caturdaśa-bhuvanātmake jaḍa-prapañce imau dvau puruṣau cetanau staḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:788: kau tāv ata āha kṣaraṃ sva-svarūpāt kṣarati vicyuto bhavatīti kṣaro jīvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:790: etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti |
GE07bhg4c15u:792: akṣaraṃ brahma paramam iti smṛteś ca
GE07bhg4c15u:794: kṣarākṣarayor arthaṃ punar viśadayati sarvāṇi bhūtāni eko jīva eva anādy-avidyayā svarūpa-vicyutaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:795: san karma-paratantraḥ samaṣṭy-ātmako brahmādi-sthāvarāntāni bhūtāni bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:797: dvitīya-puruṣo 'kṣaras tu kūṭastha ekenaiva svarūpeṇavicyutimatā sarva-kāla-vyāpī |
GE07bhg4c15u:798: ekarūpatayā tu yaḥ kāla-vyāpī sa kūṭasthaḥ ity amaraḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:799: baladevaḥ : bādarāyaṇātmanā nirṇītaṃ vedārthaṃ saṅkṣipyāha dvāv iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:800: lokyate tattvam anena iti vyutpatter loke vede |
GE07bhg4c15u:801: dvau puruṣau prathitau imāv iti pramāṇa-siddhatā sūcyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:802: tau kāv ity āha kṣaraś ceti |
GE07bhg4c15u:807: kṣarākṣarau sphuṭayati sarvāṇi brahmādi-stambāntāni bhūtāni kṣaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:812: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya ity ādeś ca bahutva-saṅkhyākaḥ saḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c15u:814: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:815: yo loka-trayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:816: śrīdharaḥ : yad artham etau lakṣitau tam āha uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:817: etābhyāṃ kṣarāksarābhyām anyo vilakṣaṇas tu uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:818: vailakṣaṇyam evāha paramaś cāsāv ātmā cety udāhṛtaḥ uktaḥ śrutibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:820: paramatvenākṣarāc cetanād bhoktur vilakṣaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:823: 'vyayaś ca nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛsnam āviśya bibharti pālayati
GE07bhg4c15u:827: uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ puruṣas tv anyonya evātyanta-vilakṣaṇa
GE07bhg4c15u:828: ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ jaḍa-rāśibhyām ubhaya-bhāsakas tṛtīyaś cetana-rāśir
GE07bhg4c15u:831: 'vidyā-kalpitātmabhyaḥ paramaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'kalpito brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhety ukta ātmā ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ pratyak-cetana ity ataḥ paramātmety uktao vedānteṣu |
GE07bhg4c15u:834: āviśya svakīyayā māyā-śaktyādhiṣṭhāya bibharti sattā-sphūrti-pradānena dhārayati poṣayati ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:835: kīdṛśaḥ ? avyayaḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnya īśvaraḥ sarvasya niyantā
GE07bhg4c15u:836: nārāyaṇaḥ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmety udāhṛta ity anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:838: viśvanāthaḥ : jñānibhir upāsyaṃ brahmoktvā yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam
GE07bhg4c15u:841: jñānibhyaś cādhiko yogīty upāsaka-vaiśiṣṭyād evopāsya-vaiśiṣṭyaṃ ca labhyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:842: paramātma-tattvam eva darśayati ya īśvara īsana-śīlo 'vyayo nirvikāra eva san loka-trayaṃ kṛtsnam āviśya bibharti dhārayati pālayati ca ||17||
GE07bhg4c15u:843: baladevaḥ : yad arthaṃ dvau puruṣau nirūpitau tam āha uttama iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:844: anyaḥ kṣarākṣarābhyāṃ na tu tayor evaikaḥ saṅkalpa iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:848: | na caitaj jagad-vidhāraṇa-pālana-rūpam īśanaṃ baddhasya jīvasya
GE07bhg4c15u:850: na ca muktasya jagad-vyāpāra-varjam iti pratiṣedhāc ca
GE07bhg4c15u:852: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:853: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c15u:854: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktaṃ puruṣottamatvam ātmano nāma-nirvacanena darśayati yasmādi it |
GE07bhg4c15u:855: yasmāt kṣaraṃ jaḍa-vargam atikrānto 'haṃ nityam uktatvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:856: akṣarāc cetana-vargād apy uttamaś ca niyantṛtvāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:857: ato loke vede ca puruṣottama iti prathitaḥ prakhyāto 'smi |
GE07bhg4c15u:858: tathā ca śrutiḥ - sa eva sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvam idaṃ praśāstīty ādi ||18||
GE07bhg4c15u:861: evety ātmānaṃ darśayati bhagavān brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāhaṃ [Gītā 14.27] tad dhāma paramaṃ mama [Gītā 15.6] ityādi prāg-ukta-nija-mahima-nirdhāraṇāya
GE07bhg4c15u:863: yasmāt kṣaraṃ kāryatvena vināśinaṃ māyāmayaṃ saṃsāra-vṛklṣam
GE07bhg4c15u:864: aśvatthākhyam atīto 'tikrānto 'haṃ parameśvaro 'kṣarād api māyākhyād avyākṛtād akṣarāt parataḥ para iti pañcamy-antākṣara-padena pratipāditāt
GE07bhg4c15u:867: uttamatvād asmi bhavāmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ prakhyātaḥ puruṣottama iti sa uttamaḥ puruṣa iti veda udāhṛta eva loke ca kavi-kāvyādau harir yathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛtaḥ ity ādi prasiddham kāruṇyato naravad ācarataḥ parārthān pārthāya bodhitavato nijam īśvaratvam |
GE07bhg4c15u:868: sac-cit-ukhaika-vapuṣaḥ puruṣottamasya nārāyaṇasya mahimā na hi mānam eti ||
GE07bhg4c15u:869: kecin nigṛhya karaṇāni visṛjya bhogam āsthāya yogam amalātma-dhiyo yatante |
GE07bhg4c15u:872: viśvanāthaḥ : yogibhir upāsyaṃ paramātmānam uktvā bhaktair upāsyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:873: bhagavantaṃ vadan bhagavattve 'pi svasya kṛṣṇa-svarūpasya puruṣottama iti nāma vyācakṣāṇaḥ sarvotkarṣam āha yasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:874: kṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ jīvātmānam atītaḥ akṣarāt puruṣāt brahmata uttamād avikārāt paramātmanaḥ puruṣād apy uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:877: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ || [Gītā 6.47] iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:880: vaikuṇṭha-nāthādeḥ sakāśād api ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam iti sūtokter aham uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:881: atra yadyapy ekam eva sac-cid-ānanda-svarūpaṃ vastu
GE07bhg4c15u:882: brahma-paramātma-bhagavat-śabdair ucyate na tu vastutaḥ svarūpataḥ ko 'pi
GE07bhg4c15u:884: tad api tat-tad-upāsakānāṃ sādhanataḥ phalataś ca bheda-darśanāt bheda iva vyavahriyate
GE07bhg4c15u:888: vastuto mokṣa eva, bhaktes tu premavat-pārṣadatvaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c15u:890: jñāna-yogābhyāṃ naiṣkarmyam apy acyuta-bhāva-varjitaṃ na śobhate [BhP
GE07bhg4c15u:894: brahmopāsakaiḥ paramātmopāsakaiḥ sva-sādhya-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ bhagavato bhaktir avaśyaṃ kartavyaiva |
GE07bhg4c15u:897: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha [BhP 11.20.31] iti, yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity ādau -
GE07bhg4c15u:904: tayā vinā tad āpnoti naro nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ || ity ādi vacanebhyaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c15u:905: ataeva bhagavad-upāsanayā svargāpavarga-premādīni sarva-phalāny eva labdhuṃ śakyante |
GE07bhg4c15u:906: brahma-paramātmopāsanayā tu na premādīnīty ata eva brahma-paramātmābhyāṃ bhagavad-utkarṣaḥ khalu abhede 'py ucyate |
GE07bhg4c15u:907: yathā tejastvenābhede 'pi jyotir dīpāgni-puñjeṣu madhye śītādy-ārti-kṣayād
GE07bhg4c15u:909: tatrāpi bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya tu parama evotkarṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:913: ataeva brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity atra yathāvad eva vyākhyātaṃ śrī-svāmi-caraṇaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:917: vihantuṃ bhūbhāraṃ vidadhad-avatāraṃ muhur aho tato vāraṃ vāraṃ bhajata kuśalārambha-kṛtinaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:921: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne || iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:924: na śaknuvanti ye soḍhuṃ te mūḍhā nirayaṃ gatāḥ ||
GE07bhg4c15u:925: ity uktavadbhiḥ kṛṣṇe sarvotkarṣa eva vyavasthāpita ity ataḥ dvāv imau ity ādi śloka-trayasyāsya vyākhyāyām asyām abhyasūyā nāviṣkartavyā |
GE07bhg4c15u:928: baladevaḥ : atha puruṣottama-nāma-nirvacanaṃ svasya tattvam āha yasmād iti uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:929: loke pauruṣeyāgame lokyate vedārtho 'nena iti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:930: vede tāvad eṣa samprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:931: jyotīrūpaṃ sampadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate, sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ity ādau prathitaḥ yat paraṃ jyotiḥ samprasādenopasampannaṃ sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ paramātmetiy arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:937: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam |
GE07bhg4c15u:938: sa sarva-vid bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena bhārata ||19||
GE07bhg4c15u:939: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūteśvarasya jñātuḥ phalam āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:941: ukta-prakāreṇāsammūḍho niścita-matiḥ san yo māṃ puruṣottamaṃ jānāti sa
GE07bhg4c15u:944: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ nāma-nirvacana-jñāne phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:945: yo mām īśvaram evaṃ yathokta-nāma-nirvacanenāsaṃmūḍho manuṣya evāyaṃ kaścit kṛṣṇa iti saṃmoha-varjito jānāty ayam īśvara eveti puruṣottamaṃ prāg vyākhyātaṃ sa māṃ bhajati sevate sarvavin māṃ sarvātmānaṃ vettīti sa eva sarvajñaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:949: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahma-bhūyāya kalpate || [Gītā 14.26] iti tad upapannam |
GE07bhg4c15u:950: yathoktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti tad apy upapannataram |
GE07bhg4c15u:953: vihantuṃ bhūbhāraṃ vidadhad-avatāraṃ muhur aho tato vāraṃ vāraṃ bhajata kuśalārambha-kṛtinaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:954: viśvanāthaḥ : nanv etasmiṃs tvayā vyavasthāpite 'py arthe vādino vivadanta
GE07bhg4c15u:955: eva, tatra vivadantāṃ te man-māyā-mohitāḥ sādhus tu na muhyatīty āha yo
GE07bhg4c15u:962: tathā ya evaṃ jānāti sa eva māṃ sarvato-bhāvena bhajati |
GE07bhg4c15u:963: tad anye bhajann api na māṃ bhajatīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c15u:964: baladevaḥ : tātparya-dyotanāya puruṣottamatva-vettuḥ phalam āha yo mām iti |
GE07bhg4c15u:965: evaṃ mad-ukta-niruktyā na tv aśva-karṇādivat saṃjñā-mātratvena |
GE07bhg4c15u:970: puruṣottamatvajño māṃ sarva-bhāvena sarva-prakāreṇa bhajaty upāste |
GE07bhg4c15u:972: prasādaḥ sa tasmin bhaved iti me puruṣottamatve sandihānas tv
GE07bhg4c15u:974: sarvathā bhajann apy abhakta iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:976: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha |
GE07bhg4c15u:977: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:980: guhyatamam atirahasyaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva mayoktam |
GE07bhg4c15u:984: śāstraṃ buddhyā buddhimān samyag jñānī syaāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:987: ko 'pi he bhārata tvaṃ kṛta-kṛtyo 'sīti kiṃ vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:992: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīm adhyāyārthaṃ stuvann upasaṃharati itīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:993: iti anena prakāreṇa guhyatamaṃ rahasyatamaṃ sampūrṇaṃ śāstram eva saṃkṣepeṇedam asminn adhyāye mayoktaṃ he 'naghāvyasana |
GE07bhg4c15u:994: etad buddhvānyo 'pi yaḥ kaścid buddhimān ātma-jñānavān syāt kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ yena na punaḥ kṛtyāntaraṃ yasyāsti sa kṛtakṛtyaś ca syāt |
GE07bhg4c15u:995: viśiṣṭa-janma-prasūtena brāhmaṇena yat kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhagavat-tattve vidite kṛtaṃ bhavet na tv anyathā
GE07bhg4c15u:998: mahākula-prasūtaḥ svayaṃ ca vyasana-rahita iti kula-guṇena sva-guṇena
GE07bhg4c15u:999: caitad buddhvā kṛta-kṛtyo bhaviṣyasīti kim u vaktavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c15u:1003: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne ||1||
GE07bhg4c15u:1004: sadā sadānanda-pade nimagnaṃ mano manobhāvam apākaroti |
GE07bhg4c15u:1005: gatāgatāyāsam apāsya sadyaḥ parāparātītam upaiti tattvam ||2||
GE07bhg4c15u:1006: śaivāḥ saurāś ca gāṇeśā vaiṣṇavāḥ śakti-pūjakāḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:1007: bhavanti yan-mayāḥ sarve so 'ham asmi paraḥ śivaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c15u:1009: na śaknuvanti ye soḍhuṃ te mūḍhā nirayaṃ gatāḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c15u:1014: viṃśatyā ślokair ebhir atirahasyaṃ śāstram eva sampūrṇaṃ mayoktam ||20||
GE07bhg4c15u:1016: kṛṣṇa eva mahotkarṣa ity adhyāyārtha īritaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c15u:1018: gītāsv ayaṃ pañcadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||
GE07bhg4c15u:1019: baladevaḥ : athaitad apātreṣv aprakāśyam iti bhāvenāha itīti |
GE07bhg4c15u:1020: ity evaṃ saṃkṣepa-rūpaṃ puruṣottamatva-nirūpakam idaṃ triślokī-śāstraṃ tubhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c15u:1022: he anagha, tvaāpy apātreṣu naitat prakāśyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:1026: baddhān muktāc ca yaḥ puṃso bhinnas tad-bhṛt tad-uttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c15u:1027: sa pumān harir eveti prāptaṃ pañcadaśād ataḥ ||
